game.title: The Unseen Threat
game.objective: Defeat the ancient dragon and retrieve the lost artifact
game.description: The majestic city of Eldoria is under a grave threat. An ancient dragon has awakened from its slumber and is wreaking havoc on the land. It is up to you, the brave adventurer, to venture into the dragon's lair, defeat the beast, and retrieve the lost artifact that holds the key to its power. Are you ready for this epic quest?

tasks.description: The Dragon Slayer Sword is a legendary weapon forged by the gods. It is said to be the only weapon capable of piercing the dragon's impenetrable scales. Find the renowned blacksmith, Gideon, in the town of Havenbrook and convince him to craft this extraordinary weapon.

The dragon's lair is said to be hidden deep within the treacherous Frostbite Mountains. Travel through the icy wilderness, facing dangerous creatures and overcoming deadly obstacles, until you reach the entrance of the lair.
The dragon is a formidable foe with immense power. Prepare yourself for an intense battle and use your wit, strength, and the Dragon Slayer Sword to overcome the beast and reclaim peace for Eldoria.
